Adult_Dosing.text:
Apply 2-3 times per day to affected area
Do not use occlusive dressing
Avoid prolonged use on face, axilla, groin
Ointment is medium/low potency; Cream and lotion are low potency

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
Age 3 months and older: apply 2 times per day to affected area
Max use 4 weeks
Avoid prolonged use on face, axilla, groin
Ointment is medium/low potency; Cream and lotion are low potency

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: Category C
Lactation risk
: May use short-term while breastfeeding but caution advised. Use lowest potency for nipple area and remove before breastfeeding.

Serious.text:

(prolonged use)
